welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Pierce, known for its picturesque beaches, charming downtown, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all this beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Lucie County Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at St Lucie County Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vero Beach Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is specifically for private flights and offers a more luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
